page.title: 20LIFE STYLES - TEEN CULTURE.
page.content: {DISCO NIGHT. }Flashing lights project diamonds on to the wall;pop,punk and breakdance music is played and girls gyrate in the smoke from a gun. The disc jockey plays a record and break- dancers,in a large circle demonstrate various movements. The "caterpillar" sends ripples through the body, the "Moonwalk" involves dancing robot- fashion.Around 9.30pm the disco ends- but there's always next week!{P.Burton {YOUNG FASHIONS.} Trainers and Pod sandals with tags added to them are popular footwear for girls and boys. Girls like mini-skirts with frills underneath, crinkly blouses and V-backed jumpers, boys-bleached jeans and wind jackets. {K.Preece. S.Tulip. {HAIR STYLES.}Mushroom cuts and 'Rat's Tails' ( a long piece of hair hanging down the back)are fashionable now. Some like Mohican styles. { C.Holmes.
